verses.name: Matthew 26:24
verses.text: The Son of man goeth as it is written of him: but woe unto that man by whom the Son of man is betrayed! it had been good for that man if he had not been born.

verses.name: Matthew 26:25
verses.text: Then Judas, which betrayed him, answered and said, Master, is it I? He said unto him, Thou hast said.

verses.name: Matthew 26:26
verses.text: And as they were eating, Jesus took bread, and blessed it, and brake it, and gave it to the disciples, and said, Take, eat; this is my body.
